name: ap_status

GET.summary:
Retrieve statistics for all managed FortiAPs.
Access Group: wifi

help: Retrieve statistics for all managed FortiAPs.

wtp_down.name: wtp_down
wtp_down.title: Down FortiAPs
wtp_down.description: Number of FortiAPs that are down.

client_peak_2g_1hour.name: client_peak_2g_1hour
client_peak_2g_1hour.title: Peak 2.4G Clients Per Hour
client_peak_2g_1hour.description: Tracks the peak number of 2.4GHz clients in each 15-minute window of an hour.

client_peak_5g_1hour.name: client_peak_5g_1hour
client_peak_5g_1hour.title: Peak 5G Clients Per Hour
client_peak_5g_1hour.description: Tracks the peak number of 5GHz clients in each 15-minute window of an hour.

client_peak_6g_1hour.name: client_peak_6g_1hour
client_peak_6g_1hour.title: Peak 6G Clients Per Hour
client_peak_6g_1hour.description: Tracks the peak number of 6GHz clients in each 15-minute window of an hour.

client_peak_2g_24hour.name: client_peak_2g_24hour
client_peak_2g_24hour.title: Peak 2.4G Clients Per Day
client_peak_2g_24hour.description: Tracks the peak number of 2.4GHz clients in each hour of a day.

client_peak_5g_24hour.name: client_peak_5g_24hour
client_peak_5g_24hour.title: Peak 5G Clients Per Day
client_peak_5g_24hour.description: Tracks the peak number of 5GHz clients in each hour of a day.

client_peak_6g_24hour.name: client_peak_6g_24hour
client_peak_6g_24hour.title: Peak 6G Clients Per Day
client_peak_6g_24hour.description: Tracks the peak number of 6GHz clients in each hour of a day.

client_peak_2g_30day.name: client_peak_2g_30day
client_peak_2g_30day.title: Peak 2.4G Clients Per Month
client_peak_2g_30day.description: Tracks the peak number of 2.4GHz clients on each day of a month.

client_peak_5g_30day.name: client_peak_5g_30day
client_peak_5g_30day.title: Peak 5G Clients Per Month
client_peak_5g_30day.description: Tracks the peak number of 5GHz clients on each day of a month.

client_peak_6g_30day.name: client_peak_6g_30day
client_peak_6g_30day.title: Peak 6G Clients Per Month
client_peak_6g_30day.description: Tracks the peak number of 6GHz clients on each day of a month.

response_description: Retrieve statistics for all managed FortiAPs.
